name: No Brakes (itch)
description:
This game was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

No Brakes is a racing game without deceleration. Hold down the acceleration with the right trigger (or "w" if you're using a keyboard) and continue to build speed. The only way you can lose speed is if you spin out by going too far off course.

Try to get the best time you can while navigating sharp turns, or you can race against your friends as this game supports split screen multiplayer with up to 4 players!

This game supports Xbox 360, Xbox One, and Playstation 4 controllers.

Also please note that while this game can be played in your browser, for the best and most optimized experience it's suggested you use one of the downloadable builds below.

Controls (Gamepad / Keyboard):

  • Accelerate: Right trigger / W
  • Turn left and right: Left stick / A + D
  • Bring up menu: Start or options / Esc
